text.name: toolTip_animalInspector_Visible
text.text: When enabled, the overlay is shown

text.name: toolTip_animalInspector_TextSize
text.text: Font Size for display, in relative pixels.

text.name: toolTip_animalInspector_ShowCount
text.text: When enabled, show number of animals and total space for animals

text.name: toolTip_animalInspector_ShowFood
text.text: When enabled, show total food available as a percentage

text.name: toolTip_animalInspector_ShowFoodTypes
text.text: When enabled, show individual food types sperately

text.name: toolTip_animalInspector_ShowReproduction
text.text: When enabled, show average reproduction of breeding age animals

text.name: toolTip_animalInspector_ShowOutputs
text.text: When enabled, show output products and extra inputs (e.g. straw)

text.name: toolTip_animalInspector_ShowPuberty
text.text: When enabled, show percentage of immature (non breeding age) animals

text.name: toolTip_animalInspector_ShowHealth
text.text: When enabled, show average health of animals

text.name: toolTip_animalInspector_TextBold
text.text: When enabled, use a bold font for the entire display

text.name: toolTip_animalInspector_DisplayMode
text.text: Where to show the overlay on screen
